sources.title: Scars of Dracula
sources.description: At Castle Dracula, a vampire bat flies in to an altar containing theÂ  powdered remains of Count Dracula. The bat spits blood onto the vampire's remains and Dracula is resurrected.

metadata.Plot: A young man, Paul Carlson, is on a trip and spends the night at Count Dracula's castle. He is murdered. After some time has passed, the young man's brother Simon comes to the small town where all the traces end to look for him.
metadata.Actors: Christopher Lee, Dennis Waterman, Jenny Hanley
